snippet: On a night when Steffi Graf loomed large over Rod Laver Arena, an inspired Angelique Kerber stunned Serena Williams in a three-set classic to win the Australian Open on Saturday and become Germany's first grand slam champion in 17 years....
lead_paragraph: On a night when Steffi Graf loomed large over Rod Laver Arena, an inspired Angelique Kerber stunned Serena Williams in a three-set classic to win the Australian Open on Saturday and become Germany's first grand slam champion in 17 years.

headline.print_headline: Kerber Stuns Serena to Protect Idol Graf's Record
headline.main: Kerber Stuns Serena to Protect Idol Graf's Record
